about_the_game:
Bruneva is an Adventure game made with RPG Maker and is the first game entirely made on Tectoy's Zeenix!
It is a simple, short-duration adventure where you take on the role of a hero who will encounter every possible ridiculous situation. It is not a game to be taken seriously. It is not even a very good game.
It is just something made with care to show that Tectoy's Zeenix can be your first attempt at making your own game!
But don't be deceived. Bruneva has a captivating story that will provide you with a good two hours of fun and, if many people like it, perhaps a sequel.

It is just something made with care to show that Tectoy's Zeenix can be your first attempt at making your own game!
But don't be deceived. Bruneva has a captivating story that will provide you with a good two hours of fun and, if many people like it, perhaps a sequel.
name: Bruneva

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In the kingdom of Bruneva, an unlikely hero embarks on a magical mission full of humor. With eccentric characters, comedic challenges, and witty dialogues, "The Adventures of Bruneva" guarantees laughter at every turn.
